mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG (CLASSIFICATION, LOGTIME, ACCOUNT_ID, IP, ACCESS_LOCATION) VALUES (#{classification},now(),#{account_id},#{ip},#{access_location})

INSERT INTO LOG (
ACCOUNT_ID,
